resources.string: Access to the location service is required to display your current location on the map

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Busog\'.
Location permission is required for the map service.

Cilantro originated from Lucca and found its home in the Philippines. Cilantro aims to offer a pleasant and luxurious dining experience serving 15 kinds of pasta, and 20 cheeses. Cilantro offers an array of white and red wine to choose from to accompany your meal. Delicious, yummy, scrumptious. This is Cilantro.
